title: Epitaph
support: Fragment of a marble plaque, damaged on top.

handNote.lettering: Regular letters, lunate Ε, cursive Ω, A and Δ with extended serifs.

provenanceFound._: Original discovery not recorded, but probably from Catania.

provenanceObserved._: Observed by Amico in Museo Biscari, later by Korhonen in Magazzino del cortile, Collezione dei Benedettini (formerly sala VI 71).

graphics.desc: I.Sicily with the permission of the Assessorato Regionale dei Beni Culturali e dell’Identità Siciliana - Dipartimento dei Beni Culturali e dell’Identità Siciliana

location.address: Castello Ursino, Piazza Federico II di Svevia, 95121 Catania (CT)
